/* eslint-disable react/jsx-no-duplicate-props */ import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./CSS/LoginSignup.css"; const LoginSignup = () => { const [loginOrSignup, setLoginOrSignup] = useState("SignUp"); return (

{loginOrSignup}

{loginOrSignup !== "Login" && ( )}

{loginOrSignup === "Login" && ( Forgot Password? )}

{loginOrSignup === "Login" ? "Does not have an account? " : "Already have an account? "} {loginOrSignup === "Login" ? "SignUp" : "Login"}

{loginOrSignup} with Google
); }; export default LoginSignup;
